data:query.name: CountryGroupReport
data:query.data:static-query: SELECT DU.USER_ADDRESS_COUNTRY AS USER_COUNTRY ,DU.USER_FULL_NAME ,SUM(IF(DA.ACTIVITY_TYPE = 'Call', 1, 0)) AS CALLS ,SUM(IF(DA.ACTIVITY_TYPE = 'Meeting', 1, 0)) AS MEETINGS ,SUM(IF(DA.ACTIVITY_TYPE = 'Email', 1, 0)) AS EMAILS ,COUNT(FA.ACTIVITY_TK) AS TOTAL_ACTIVITIES FROM F_ACTIVITIES FA INNER JOIN D_ACTIVITIES DA ON FA.ACTIVITY_TK = DA.ACTIVITY_TK INNER JOIN D_USERS DU ON FA.ASSIGNED_USER_TK = DU.USER_TK INNER JOIN D_DATE DD ON FA.ACTIVITY_DATE_TK = DD.DATE_TK WHERE DD.`YYYY-MM` BETWEEN (${pActivityFromDateFilter}) AND (${pActivityToDateFilter}) AND (DA.ACTIVITY_PARENT_TYPE IN (${pModuleFilter}) OR 'All Modules' IN (${pModuleFilter})) AND (DU.USER_ADDRESS_COUNTRY IN (${pUserCountryFilter}) OR 'All Agent Countries' IN (${pUserCountryFilter})) AND (FA.ACTIVITY_DELETED = ${pShowDeletedRecords} OR 1 = ${pShowDeletedRecords}) GROUP BY 1,2 ORDER BY 1,2 ASC;
